name: Zany Golf [SG]
description:
UNBELIEVE-A-BALL... INCREDI-BALL... ADDICTI-BALL!

Nine of the craziest holes you've ever seen...Each one like a separate arcade game... Featuring Individual music tracks, rich animated background graphics and a host of very unusual obstacles.

- WINDMILL
- HAMBURGER
- WALLS
- PINBALL
- FANS
- CASTLE
